response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the saucer without any errors. Now, the robot needs to grasp the saucer.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the saucer.
(2) Grasp the saucer.
(3) Move to the countertop.
(4) Put the saucer on the countertop.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Grasp the saucer
    saucer_192 = registry(env,"saucer_192")
    EasyGrasp(robot, saucer_192)
    donothing(env)
